description.zh-CN: [题目435] Minimum removals to make non-overlapping....
description.zh-TW: [題目435] Minimum removals to make non-overlapping....
description.ja: [問題435] Minimum removals to make non-overlapping....

explanation.en: APL solution for Non-overlapping Intervals. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Non-overlapping Intervals 的 APL 解决方案。使用等级 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回将对数组排序的索引。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Non-overlapping Intervals 的 APL 解決方案。使用等級 (⍋/⍒) 排序 - 返回將對陣列排序的索引。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
explanation.ja: APL solution for Non-overlapping Intervals. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.es: APL solution for Non-overlapping Intervals. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.de: APL solution for Non-overlapping Intervals. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.fr: APL solution for Non-overlapping Intervals. Uses grade (⍋/⍒) for sorting - returns indices that would sort the array. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
